chunks.chunk_content:
IITJ_WLAN configuration steps for Windows  User  
Connect with SSID : IITJ_WLAN  from available Wi -Fi connection on your  Windows 
machine . In the Network name field type Wi-Fi SSID name : IITJ_WLAN . You will now be presented with a Successfully added your wifi ssid IITJ_WLAN  
message. Now 
you should successfully connect to IITJ_WLAN Wi -Fi SSID to access the internet 
facililty.

Enter your  internet access  username and password  and click on okay to 
access internet services . In some Win dows machines , above  mentioned steps will not w ork due to manually 
enable security  or updates then you need to configure the same manually via 
following steps . Look for Network and Sharing Window and click on [ Set u p a new connection or 
network ]. Let’s  click on [ Change connection 
settings ]. Now click on settings under [Security ] tab. Now enter your internet access  user name and password, followed by clicking on 
OK. 
 
 
12. Click on the OK Button on all 2 previous windows as well.

On your Windows device open search, type Control Panel and open the Control 
Panel application. Once the Control Panel window is open click on [ View network status and tasks ]. Now click on [ Manually connect to a wireless network ] followed by clicking Next. In the Security type  
select WPA2 -Enterprise  from dropdown  list and click on Next. Once back on Wireless Network Properties click on [ Advanced Settings ]. Last step is to click on [Close ] of the manually connect to a wireless network.
However,  you are not finished yet.

Un-Check Verify the server’s identity by validating the certificate  and t hen click OK.  
 

9. Select the [ checkbox ] for Specify authentication mode  under Advanced settings . Choose [User authentication ] from the dropdown  and click on [Save credentials ] 
 

11.
